Class TeamJdbcIO

java.lang.Object
  edu.rpi.hagemt.hw12.TeamIO
      edu.rpi.hagemt.hw12.TeamJdbcIO

public final class TeamJdbcIO
extends TeamIO

Utility class to handle communication with a database via JDBC.

Author:
Tor E Hagemann

getTeam

public static void getTeam(java.io.File f,
                           java.util.ArrayList<Player> team)
                    throws java.sql.SQLException
Fetches all records currently stored in the database and adds player data to the team list.

Parameters:
f - a file containing the abstract path name to the database
team - the list to which this team data will be added
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException - if JDBC communication did not complete properly

saveTeam

public static void saveTeam(java.io.File f,
                            java.util.ArrayList<Player> team)
                     throws java.sql.SQLException
Removes all records currently stored in the database and replaces them using team data.

Parameters:
f - a file containing the abstract path name to the database
team - the list from which this team data will be read
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException - if JDBC communication did not complete properly

updatePlayer

public static boolean updatePlayer(Player a,
                                   Player b)
Update a given player's record using data from another given player. Only the first encountered record is replaced, if it exists.

Parameters:
a - the old player whose record is to be replaced
b - the new player whose record is to replace a's
Returns:
true if the operation was successful, otherwise false
